info.pascalkrause.vertx.mongodata.datasource

Interface MongoDataSource

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MongoClientDataSource

    public interface MongoDataSource

    • Method Detail

      • count

        MongoDataSource count(java.lang.String collection,
                      io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject query,
                      io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Long>> resultHandler)
        Count matching documents in a collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        query - query used to match documents
        resultHandler - will be provided with the number of matching documents
        Returns:
        The actual instance of MongoDataSource.

      • find

        MongoDataSource find(java.lang.String collection,
                     io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject query,
                     io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.util.List<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject>>> resultHandler)
        Find matching documents in the specified collection
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        query - query used to match documents
        resultHandler - will be provided with list of documents
        Returns:
        The actual instance of MongoDataSource.

      • upsert

        MongoDataSource upsert(java.lang.String collection,
                       io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject document,
                       io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.String>> resultHandler)
        Insert or update a document into the collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        document - The document to insert or update.
        resultHandler - A handler to handle the AsnycResult which contains a String with the new id (insert), or null (update).
        Returns:
        The actual instance of MongoDataSource.

      • bulkInsert

        MongoDataSource bulkInsert(java.lang.String collection,
                           java.util.List<io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject> documents,
                           io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Long>> resultHandler)
        Insert many documents into the collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        documents - A collection of resources to insert into the collection.
        resultHandler - A handler to handle the AsnycResult which contains the number of inserted documents.
        Returns:
        The actual instance of MongoDataSource.

      • removeDocuments

        MongoDataSource removeDocuments(java.lang.String collection,
                                io.vertx.core.json.JsonObject query,
                                io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Long>> resultHandler)
        Remove matching documents in a collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - the collection
        query - A filter for the remove request.
        resultHandler - A handler to handle the AsnycResult which contains the number of deleted entries.
        Returns:
        The actual instance of MongoDataSource.

      • dropCollection

        MongoDataSource dropCollection(java.lang.String collection,
                               io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> resultHandler)
        Drops the collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection.
        resultHandler - will be called when complete
        Returns:
        The actual instance of MongoDataSource.

      • listIndexes

        MongoDataSource listIndexes(java.lang.String collection,
                            io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<io.vertx.core.json.JsonArray>> resultHandler)
        List all indexes.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection.
        resultHandler - A handler which contains a JsonArray including indexes.
        Returns:
        The actual MongoDataSource.

      • createIndex

        MongoDataSource createIndex(java.lang.String collection,
                            Index index,
                            io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> resultHandler)
        Creates an index on the collection. If there is already an index with this name, it will be overridden.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection.
        resultHandler - A handler which will be called when the index is created.
        Returns:
        The actual MongoDataSource.

      • deleteIndex

        MongoDataSource deleteIndex(java.lang.String collection,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            io.vertx.core.Handler<io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>> resultHandler)
        Deletes an index.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection.
        name - The name of the index which should be deleted.
        resultHandler - A handler which will be called when the index is deleted.
        Returns:
        The actual MongoDataSource.
